problem.p: For the Landscape Arch example, how would the compressive stress in the arch change if the height was 30m instead of 24m?

choicegroup.label: For the Landscape Arch example, how would the compressive stress in the arch change if the height was 30m instead of 24m?
choicegroup.choice: compressive stress will stay the same

div.p: As the height of the arch increases, the compressive force in the arch decreases.
